abilities.description: Buggy's body can separate into pieces, making him immune to slashing and cutting attacks, including the blade-like leaves of Level 1's Crimson Hell.
abilities.limitations: Does not protect against blunt attacks or other damage types

keyMoments.title: Buggy's Immunity to Level 1 Torture
keyMoments.description: Buggy's Bara Bara no Mi powers make him immune to the cutting torture of Level 1's blade-like leaves and needle-sharp grass.
keyMoments.significance: Explains why Buggy can survive and attempt escape from Level 1 more easily than other prisoners.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone

reveals.information: The Bara Bara no Mi's separation ability provides immunity to the cutting torture of Impel Down Level 1

abilities.description: Can turn people and objects to stone. Works on those who feel attraction toward the user, but Hancock can also petrify those without romantic feelings.
abilities.limitations: Victims can be restored to normal by the user

keyMoments.title: Hancock Petrifies Domino
keyMoments.description: Hancock uses her Mero Mero no Mi powers to petrify Domino and surveillance equipment during a body check, enabling Luffy to infiltrate Impel Down undetected.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hancock's tactical use of her powers for deception and her willingness to risk her position to help Luffy.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
Victims can be restored to normal by the user

reveals.information: Can petrify surveillance equipment (Den Den Mushi) in addition to people
Petrified victims have no memory of being turned to stone when restored
Hancock can use petrification strategically for infiltration and deception
